benchmark_details.name: MedChain
benchmark_details.overview: MedChain is a comprehensive clinical decision-making benchmark designed to simulate real-world scenarios in healthcare, comprising 12,163 clinical cases that cover five key stages of clinical workflow.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the capabilities of LLM-based agents in clinical decision-making by providing a realistic benchmark that incorporates personalization, interactivity, and sequentiality.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset derived from a single source may limit generalizability; future work aims to incorporate diverse data sources.

data.source: Chinese medical website 'iiYi', which provides validated clinical cases.
data.annotation: Validated by professional physicians and de-identified to ensure patient privacy.

methodology.calculation: Scores are based on the correctness of decisions through a multi-stage evaluation process.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in clinical decision-making tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: MedChain-Agent framework demonstrates significant improvements over existing approaches.
methodology.validation: Performed by a panel of senior physicians ensuring data integrity and clinical relevance.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data has been de-identified to protect patient privacy.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Formal permission obtained for data use from the site administrators.
